languages.text: "С момента нашей встречи вы в первую очередь думали о своем благополучии, Лорд-капитан. Моя благодарность проявляется в верном служении сему кораблю, исполнении навигаторского долга. А чувства... их нельзя обязать".

traits.locale_text: "С момента нашей встречи вы в первую очередь думали о своем благополучии, Лорд-капитан. Моя благодарность проявляется в верном служении сему кораблю, исполнении навигаторского долга. А чувства... их нельзя обязать".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."
languages.original_text: "С момента нашей встречи вы в первую очередь думали о своем благополучии, Лорд-капитан. Моя благодарность проявляется в верном служении сему кораблю, исполнении навигаторского долга. А чувства... их нельзя обязать".

traits.locale_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be obligated to be."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be obligated to be."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “从我们初次见面起，你最看重的始终是你的个人私利，舰长大人。我对你心怀感激，为此，我作为导航者，忠诚地引导这艘飞船。然而，感情是勉强不来的。”
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."

traits.locale_text: “从我们初次见面起，你最看重的始终是你的个人私利，舰长大人。我对你心怀感激，为此，我作为导航者，忠诚地引导这艘飞船。然而，感情是勉强不来的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seit dem Augenblick, in dem wir uns begegnet sind, habt Ihr mein Wohlergehen immer über alles gestellt, Lord Captain. Ich verleihe meiner Dankbarkeit Ausdruck, indem ich treu diesem Schiff diene und meine Pflichten als seine Navigatorin erfülle. Gefühle jedoch ... lassen sich nicht erzwingen."
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."

traits.locale_text: "Seit dem Augenblick, in dem wir uns begegnet sind, habt Ihr mein Wohlergehen immer über alles gestellt, Lord Captain. Ich verleihe meiner Dankbarkeit Ausdruck, indem ich treu diesem Schiff diene und meine Pflichten als seine Navigatorin erfülle. Gefühle jedoch ... lassen sich nicht erzwingen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis notre rencontre, vous avez toujours fait passer votre propre bien-être avant tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous exprime ma gratitude en servant loyalement à bord de ce vaisseau et en accomplissant mon devoir comme navigatrice. Les sentiments, toutefois... cela ne se commande pas. »
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis notre rencontre, vous avez toujours fait passer votre propre bien-être avant tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous exprime ma gratitude en servant loyalement à bord de ce vaisseau et en accomplissant mon devoir comme navigatrice. Les sentiments, toutefois... cela ne se commande pas. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Desde el momento en que nos conocimos, usted siempre ha antepuesto su propio bienestar, Lord Capitán. Expreso mi gratitud sirviendo fielmente a esta nave y cumpliendo mis deberes como navegante. Los sentimientos, sin embargo... no pueden ser forzados».
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."

traits.locale_text: «Desde el momento en que nos conocimos, usted siempre ha antepuesto su propio bienestar, Lord Capitán. Expreso mi gratitud sirviendo fielmente a esta nave y cumpliendo mis deberes como navegante. Los sentimientos, sin embargo... no pueden ser forzados».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お会いした瞬間から、あなたはいつもご自身の安泰を第一にしてきました。この船に忠実に尽くし、航宙士としてのあたくしの任務を遂行することで、感謝を示してきました。ですが、感情は…抑えがたいものなのです」
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お会いした瞬間から、あなたはいつもご自身の安泰を第一にしてきました。この船に忠実に尽くし、航宙士としてのあたくしの任務を遂行することで、感謝を示してきました。ですが、感情は…抑えがたいものなのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seni gördüğüm ilk andan beri kendi çıkarlarını her şeyin önüne koyuyorsun Lord Kaptan. Minnetimin bir nişanesi olarak bu gemiye hizmeti ve Rotacılık vazifemi sürdüreceğim. Ancak malum... Zorla güzellik olmaz."
languages.original_text: "From the moment we met, you have always put your own welfare first, Lord Captain. I express my gratitude by faithfully serving this ship and carrying out my duties as her Navigator. Feelings, however... cannot be compelled."
